commentary: Here's some more incredible food for thought. Do you think Tavros wears a diaper? It's probably more convenient than rolling all the way upstairs to the load gaper. Wait, okay, I'm going to stop talking about this. But...who changes it? Tinkerbull? Tinkerbull might be too small and weak to manage. Oh, I know. I bet Vriska comes over to change it personally every month, because of what a good friend she is, and it's really the least she can do, after the accident. All right, NOW I will stop  talking about this, before things start getting unseemly.
